website_summaries.verdict: This realistic-sounding deer call  is well-made and includes a CD to help you perfect your technique.
pros: Comes with a CD to help you practice your technique
Allows you to quickly adjust sounds from buck to doe
Rubber coating on the sounding tube
cons: This call does not perform as well as others in sub-freezing temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Call
customer_reviews.text: Most versatile and easy to use call. Simple to mimic and create real-life deer calling scenarios. I was able to call in this nine shortly after a few does walked through during rut. Scent was there, and this call surely made the difference to grab the bucks attention.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: DONT OVER CALL WITH IT. It works if used sparingly. Real good during the rut.
customer_reviews.text: The Illusion Extinguisher is the best selling for a reason. It will work if you use it like you have some since. Just 1 or 2 grunts and put it up for at least 1/2 hour. I lost one so I had to get another. You cant beat this call. This one does it all ! Truly, J.F. Young
customer_reviews.author: J.F. Young

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I definitely wouldn’t have had an opportunity to harvest this buck without this call. Moving from a doe bleet to a grunt is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Jgrove

customer_reviews.title: So far very cool
customer_reviews.text: I got the videos working on the app. So far very cool and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Got an 8 pointer on the 1st time
customer_reviews.text: I harvested an 8 pointer after using this thing alternating between deep buck grunts and doe in estrous bleats after an 1 and 45 minutes. AND i had really no idea how to use it AND was using it backwards (Inhaling on the black hose). I only realized this after watching the DVD (and it was tough to view as I was unable to switch between chapters). Bottom line is it pulled that buck in from the woods to about 60 yards away. Bad: Using the fawn cry can be rough as it sometimes squeals and no instructions as to how to attach lanyard and what to do with that spring that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: It is good to go!
customer_reviews.text: Grunted in my biggest Fl buck with it. 18 steps and I was sitting in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Allen L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grunt call!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this call one month ago and have drawn in and harvested three deer with it. 2 does and an 8 point buck. This is my first grunt call I've ever used and it works. Make sure you watch the instructional video on the dvd or YouTube. It will help you know what calls you want to do and in what order.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Follow the video if you have never used a call for deer.  You may scare them if not used right.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds are clean and clear. I followed the video that came with the call. It really helps for first time callers. This is amazing. First time user of trying to use a call for deer. Michigan is no longer going to allow baiting so I thought I would try this to see how it works. I have added a picture of the 8 point I called in. You better be ready when you start to use the call. They come fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Styles

customer_reviews.title: ... I used this deer call I grunted in a nice 8pt buck
customer_reviews.text: The second time I used this deer call I grunted in a nice 8pt buck. It really is a great deer call.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Is exactly as represented by website and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Is exactly as represented by website and company. 3 hunts 2 mature deer. That may be a little luck but I'm completely satisfied with the product. Doesnt stick, sound awkward or feel cheap. Size is easy to carry. Highly recommend this over gimmicks.
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Jones III

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best deer call on the market. It doesn't freeze up like the o ring styles do and we called in 12 deer with it this year alone, in which half were big bucks!
customer_reviews.author: EWP

customer_reviews.title: just then a large buck came out over 100 yards away I blew into the call like the CD showed me and the buck came running ...
customer_reviews.text: I was in a ground blind a large doe came out I could not resist I shot her, just then a large buck came out over 100 yards away I blew into the call like the CD showed me and the buck came running right to me! I could not reload my crossbow fast enough he saw me and took off but the call worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Farinella

customer_reviews.title: My first confidence call
customer_reviews.text: Most things I read and try in deer calls are okay at best. This thing is legit. It’s the first one I’ve tried that actually brought deer in so far. The video does a fantastic job of giving scenarios and responses to properly use the call. Nothing short of happy to have this call!
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together call
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of versatility that this call delivers into one call. It allows me to hold several calls into one small package which allows me to pack a little bit lighter while walking out to the stand or during a stalk. I am also very pleased that I can purchase parts for my call if anything were to fail. I could even purchase extra parts ahead of time and carry them with me in case I have any issues in the field and still pack light.
customer_reviews.author: Whitehorse

customer_reviews.title: good call
customer_reviews.text: Used this season in Kentucky. Opening morning I was watching a doe at about 100 yards turn and come right to me after using the grunt. Had several other deer come in throughout the season, not the monster buck I was hoping for but deer none the less. Very easy to use and the instructional video is also very helpful. I have not put effort into calling deer before but this has made a believer out of me.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Fudd

customer_reviews.title: Now I’m going to have to bye another. My son took mine
customer_reviews.text: If you ever watched the video you would know what lm saying when I say great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good all around deer call.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, versitile, good instructional dvd (also available on YouTube!) So far I can chalk up 1 early season deer to this call, its only October! cant wait to see how well it does in the rest of the early season and the start of regular rifle season! also all you have to do is slide the call adjuster to clear ice from the reed great feature. You can make Buck, Doe, and Fawn calls, may not be the best, but definitely gets the job done. This has become my "all terrain" deer call.
customer_reviews.author: TeaMastaFlex!

customer_reviews.title: Called awesome buck straight to me Buck went in woods 200 ...
customer_reviews.text: Called awesome buck straight to me Buck went in woods 200 yds with doe. 2 loud shorts and one long. He came straight to me like on a string!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Newell

customer_reviews.title: Solid Proven Deer Call
customer_reviews.text: worked great for muzzleloader season this year in North Florida. Bagged an impressive 8 point with the help of this call. First saw his tail and used the doe bleat function on this call. that got his attention and he came running right on in! overall excellent call. well made. easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Auber

customer_reviews.title: Freaking Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best call ever!!!!!!! I was in my stand not even 15 minutes and decided to do 4 contact grunts. Less than 5 minutes later a eight pointer literally ran, not walked in! You know how the story goes from here. Best call I ever used!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the external slider made it easy to go between doe and mature buck for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I grunted in and shot a big 6 pointer a few days ago using this call. I own other adjustable grunt tubes which may have done the job as well, but the external slider made it easy to go between doe and mature buck for a seamless sequence of doe bleat and buck contact/tending grunts. Two rounds of this series of bleats and grunts had this buck come in nose down and on a string...and I was calling blindly as a last second hail mary trying to make something happen in the last 5 minutes of shooting light.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! My husband had ordered one before and loves his also. We both use it and recommend it to all our friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Owens

customer_reviews.title: I was told from other hunters "that this was the best deer call on the market and it would stop ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it and received it 2 days later. Very fast delivery and I was surprised. I used it today Dec. 4, and stopped a buck in its tracks. He turned around and started listening and started towards me. He stopped again at about 20 yards in front of me looking. I'm a bow hunter and the shot was head on plus he was looking directly at me and if I had moved he would have bolted. I was told from other hunters "that this was the best deer call on the market and it would stop deer in their tracks". I'm now a believer. I strongly recommend the Extinguisher Deer Call and the dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Worth

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was great until.. It broke.. Purchased one more to see if it holds up
customer_reviews.text: This product was suppose to be delivered between November 14th to November 21st. It was delivered on the 9th. I was very impressed with not only the delivery but also the product at first. The call literally got stuck in the buck call position. It will not function after only two days of hunting.. *** I purchased another one for the 2018-2019 deer season. We'll see how this one holds up. I really like the options this call has and the sound. Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.author: #Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Good in warmer weather
customer_reviews.text: Bought the extinguisher because everyone waves about it. Now after a year of use i haven't called anything in with it but also i live in part of the country with low deer populations so no matter what call you have you'll rarely call one in. My problem with this call is it sounds good but as soon as mid 30's rolls around the slide on the call freezes up and you'll be unable to use it until you warm in back up. on the plus side the slide to change to different tones is easy to use and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best sounding deer call I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The DVD really goes in depth on how to properly ...
customer_reviews.text: The DVD really goes in depth on how to properly make a call. All the way from a buck running and out of breath during the rut, to a fawn calling out because it's lost. The DVD tells you when to use the caller and when not, it takes practice. It also explains how to take the device apart for cleaning, and if need be, how to get replacement parts. I took the caller with me into the mountains, and simply put, it works. Giving an edge while also making any hunt much more exciting and enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Guardrail

customer_reviews.title: Call sounds great an super easy to adjust the tones
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it on a deer yet, having an off season! Call sounds great an super easy to adjust the tones! Hoping it will help me in harvesting a nice deer or two!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply assembled and made no sound
customer_reviews.text: For having mostly good reviews, even from a friend who uses one... I was quite disappointed. Mine must have been defective, cause I got one of the models that others have reported to not work out if the box. As mentioned in other poor rated reviews, no matter how hard or soft I blow... NADA! With the exception of the rubber flex tube cover (I did like that part), the rest of the call was cheaply made, and loosely assembled. It seemed as if more air was coming out from around the slide than the end of the tube itself. Great concept... but definitely needs better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Illusion Customer Service, WORST I ever dealt with!
customer_reviews.text: Illusion is down right has the worst customer service. Tried contacting them twice with no responds from them! Talk about frustrating! I ended up losing the rubber coated tube part of my call, which comes off very easily! I’m sure I’m not the first person this has happened to. Went to Illusion Game Calls home web page, wrote to them, told them I’d be happy to pay for a new rubber coated tube. And no a word from them. Season starts next Monday and today is Thursday. So I doubt I’ll be using this grunt tube. Save your money and spend it on a product where the company will take care of you!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent call that elimnates the need for multiple calls!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best Deer call I've every owned. The fact that I can slide the adjustment for Buck Doe or fawn and change the tones with a simple slide eliminates the need to have multiple calls. I've had it out in the field below freezing and had the reed freeze, slide the adjuster back and forth a few time and viola back in operation no need to pull it apart and fuss around with it. I think this is a simply amazing deer call and would buy it again in a flash!
customer_reviews.author: Bitwave

customer_reviews.title: Deer will come running
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother in law. He says that all the deer come running when he uses this call. Sometimes he even has to choose which one to shoot because there are so many. It sounds just like a real deer.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great!
customer_reviews.text: The Extinguisher is very easy to change from one call to another. The instructional video was very helpful, although I need more practice. I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Extinguisher. When I received and opened it, I was already happy with it's solid build/design. The slider is great. The lanyard with the spring is great. For years I have buck called with my mouth and hands. Ehhh, it works but need to be able to hit more tones and have consistency. Friends said, get the extinguisher, it will cover so many sounds and give you consistency. So, I have recorded it in my studio, to compare, and I am more than impressed. I can't wait to use it this season. I will be back with more reviews during or after this season. *My ratings are based on initial purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as effectively and easily as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used too many grunt tubes to remember over the years..this particular tube is by far the easiest, most versatile and effective of all the calls I have used. The proof is in the pudding..I consistently call in does and bucks to within a few feet of my stand. Not only do I recommend this calling system..I have given it as gifts to several of my deer hunting friends!! I am definiely a believer!!
customer_reviews.author: NPC

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to use this call. I got out in my stand hoping to bring in a few does as I’m reducing the doe population and went to blow a fawn call and it was a mature grunt. Slid the reed up and down thinking it was stuck and mature grunt again. After taking the end off I realized the seal ring for the reed adjustment was missing. Amazon is sending a replacement and I will update this review if this call makes it through the season. But right now it seems pretty cheap and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Rb82

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: The tone pitch was a little mellow for a male whitetail, would not work on the doe setting, takes to much air to blow the fawn bleat. i cannot recommend this at this time , i will order a second to see if i just got a dud. i have over fifty years experiencing deer hunting and enjoy using calls. so far over the number of calls this one is not going to be one of my favorites but a christmas gift for a grandkid.
customer_reviews.author: TOM BLACKWOLF

customer_reviews.title: Fails in field with moisture build up
customer_reviews.text: Want to love this product. Versatility and accuracy of sounds are great. Easy enough to learn how to make great calls. Unfortunately a few uses tended to build up moisture on the Reed and preventing it from working at all except on the lowest buck grunt setting and even then not well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it, unless you hunt in central MD and will shoot my deer.
customer_reviews.text: Great call. I love the slide as this was impossible with other calls I’ve used. The doe bleat is a weak point but I still use “the can”. Can’t beat it for grunts IMO. If you’re like me and like to take things apart, be carefully. Little rubber piece inside that will spring and fly away. Not a complaint- just a note.
customer_reviews.author: Rex9802

customer_reviews.title: Lanyard is Useless
customer_reviews.text: The call is of better construction than my previous one. It still requires more blow than I'd like for sound to start, you have to then back-off the blow to get the sound to lower for most buck calls. There is no mount for the lanyard on the call and a metal bracket on the line itself which makes it impossible to just rig the line around the call somewhere. You'll have to figure out your own solution if you want to wear it around your neck.
customer_reviews.author: hotdogandasoda

customer_reviews.title: Worse so in the colder weather
customer_reviews.text: First throw the lanyard out. Keep it in your pocket. Then take the call apart every couple hunts and clean out the moisture. I found the moisture gets on the reed and makes it not function correctly. Worse so in the colder weather. I had deer come in after using the call, but it's hard to say if I called them in or if they were coming in anyway. I did use the call on some spooked edgy deer where my scent was blowing at them. Stopped them, they showed interest, but I think they knew I was there and were not coming any closer. These were the only deer I could actually see this season when using the call.
customer_reviews.author: Rosco

customer_reviews.title: Not happy What a bummer
customer_reviews.text: At first it was great for a day. Then went hunting with it and it stopped making the realistic sound. Took it apart watched all the videos. And still doesn't work right. I really was excited about it. But I compared mine to my friends and it looks like mine has poor quality in production and isn't like my friends call. Plastic has bubble marks in and out of tube and the bottom rubber tube is like 2 inches shorter then his. Wish that the company would make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Eric lavoie

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star - all marketing hype, no substance
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t as impressed with this as I had hoped and felt the hype wasn’t accurate. Gets stuck in higher pitches calls. Just a basic grunt tube that doesn’t function as well as it should. Sound compared to other calls is poor at best and unrealistic. Seems as though the owners did a really great job with marketing and a really bad job creating a useful product. Clear lack of caring about the sound of the call.
customer_reviews.author: Big Buck Registry

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great. Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I think it is just an average buck grunt call that is overpriced. The benefit is the non-freezing reed but I have yet to try that. Honestly I like the True Talker by Hunters Specialties better. The best buck grunt out there that works the best with the truest sounds of a dominate buck grunt is the Brawler by Quaker Boy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Called in 3 bucks!
customer_reviews.text: This is no exaggerated hunting story. I watched the YouTube vids on how to use this call, and after some home practice, I had it down. Took it out on the last hunt day of the season, and at 4:15pm, made some doe calls, and sure enough...2 bucks...4:45pm, called again and a 3rd popped out...this really works folks.
customer_reviews.author: 2Dogs1Name

customer_reviews.title: Broke after couple times
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I saw good reviews. Used it one day in the stand and an o-ring fell out. It would only do a buck call after that. I feel it should be better constructed since I only use it a couple times a year and already have problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Meeeeaahhh
customer_reviews.text: I've used two of these deer calls over two years (got mad and gave the first one away) and have not had any deer respond. One buck walked past at 60 yards and never paid any mind to my calls. Two other bucks were chasing a hot doe and none of the 3 deer stopped. I've seen this thing work on various hunting shows on unpressured private land deer. No luck on high pressure public land/military training areas. Good quality and like the sliding reed function.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, great price, easy to use, realistic sounds, quick ship
customer_reviews.author: C. Mire

customer_reviews.title: Not good in the cold
customer_reviews.text: I had pretty high expectations for this call after reading several reviews and watching the instructional videos. I received the call and was really impressed with the sound quality after a few at-home practice sessions. Unfortunately, this call did not function well for me on a cold opening day of gun season in Western NY. The call continually froze on me despite me clearing it several times with the selection switch before use. It would then produce a distorted noise or no noise at all when being used. This would occur about half of the time I tried using it. Really disappointing since the sound quality was great out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I used this deer call 4 half of the whitetail deer season and South Carolina for 2019. It seems to work on younger deer but I'm not sure about mature deer yet because I have not had one come into it and I'd like to have more time before I give a full review on it. I will update this review at the end if the year.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty great. I e yet to have anything come in, but it does sound exactly what I want it to sound like. And I haven't spooked deer with it unlike my others which sounded more like a pig. Lol they're a great company with tons of tutorials and instructional videos, as well, so I'd recommend them if you want to utilize calling.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best deer call
customer_reviews.text: My husband received one of these a few years ago as a gift. It is the most realistic call we've ever tried. He was heartbroken when it blew off his ATV never again to be seen. So, I had to order the exact same one no matter the price. This is the only one he want to use ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far, however....
customer_reviews.text: It makes good sounds, seems the most natural sound of all the tubes I've tried. Easy to use and adjust. But it does get stuck sometimes when the temp is very low. And I honestly can't day I've ever had a positive result attracting a deer with it (though I admit it might just be my calling skills). Still worth having if you must use a grunt tube.
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly2girls

customer_reviews.title: I have never been much of a believer in deer ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never been much of a believer in deer calls. I normally sit silent and wait. I wanted to experiment with this call while in the Box Stand. I done a test over a few hours, knowing there were deer in and around the area. I could not see the deer because of the over growth, but I knew they where there. I tried different calls, doe bleep, fawn, buck all of the different calls. I will tell you with 100 percent certainty, it may have not moved those deer closer, but it got them on their feet and moving around. If your want a call I would say this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: KYfisherman

customer_reviews.title: Great range from buck to fawn
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic call. It's range from old buck through fawn is fantastic and very easy to change between them quickly. I called in 2 bucks the first few days of using it. No longer do I have to dismantle the call to change tones! Other calls produce a great deep buck grunt but fall short on the doe and fawn bleat. This call does a great job in all ranges!
customer_reviews.author: VAS Custom Rods

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: This product does not have the right sound that I expected any of the calls to have. I tried to call in a young 8 and it pretty much ran away tail up from the call, a few day later used my old can call and I had him right under the tree. Pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: This call works really great. Did an average buck grunt once and a large buck that I didn't know was in the area immediately showed up within a minute. Picture of said buck is included. Would definitely recommend for anyone whether a beginner like I was or even experienced callers.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Best call on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've never used an easier call. Live the fact you can quickly change tones with the slide. Called in several deer this season, just nothing I chose to harvest. Not the calls fault. I recommend this call for your deer hunting bag. Can be used pre-rut, and post-rut.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Perry

customer_reviews.title: Best Deer Call on the Market in my humble opinion
customer_reviews.text: Nothing else matters. No other call matters. This is what matters.... The Extinguisher Deer Call and the knowledge of how to use it. I am no expert nor do I claim to be. But if you want to bag Big Bucks, get this call. You can go to the Deer Society webpage and watch the videos of this call in action! It sells itself...
customer_reviews.author: Eric Elam

customer_reviews.title: Missed buck due to constant freezing issues
customer_reviews.text: For a call that doesn't freeze mine froze constantly. I missed bringing a buck in because it froze. By the time I warmed it up in my pouch with 4 hand warmers (took about 5 minutes) buck as gone... When I'd manage to loosen the o-ring on lighter freezes I have to blow harder which ruins the consistency of pitch and tone... This might be good early season but leave it home when there's snow.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wirtz

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply built and didn't work right out of the box. Blew into it until I was blue in the face and nothing happened. I tried everything. Don't waste your money on this piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: LuckyDave049

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds for great price
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I had a cheap call before this one that sounded terrible. This call is fantastic. The fawn setting sounds very realistic. The buck setting sounds exactly right. Check out their YouTube videos. After a five minute video I sounded way better with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Uhm
customer_reviews.text: It has a good doe sound but it does not go to deep for older buck sounds. Also after a few times of use it gets wet inside and no matter how many times you slide the reed up and down you still have to take it apart to dry it out.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: I like the concept of this call
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this call, I believe the call I received was old and reed did not function properly. I mite try one more time.but I will buy directly from the company to make sure it's fresh, if they will work with me.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Parker

customer_reviews.title: ... roar for the lower pitch stuff) and it is good when the weather is warm
customer_reviews.text: I use it mostly for fawn bleats and the higher pitch grunts (I use a primos buck roar for the lower pitch stuff) and it is good when the weather is warm. The manufacturer claims the slide can "unfreeze it in low temps" which is only kinda does. But since no one else claims this I really cannot hold it against them. I have yet to have a deer respond favorably to it, but at the same time when I grunt and bleat they also dont go running then other direction...so likely I just need to work on my calling technique.
customer_reviews.author: JD010

customer_reviews.title: Heavy usage
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to use this call, I have watched video and I practice at home. I'm a 2 year in hunter and this year will be first using a call. And with a quick slide button to switch between Buck, Doe, and Fawn, its perfect for a new hunter to learn with.
customer_reviews.author: JoMo

customer_reviews.title: Works good until it gets real cold
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the reed freezing and making a honking noise at first till it started moving again. Only does this when it is really cold, I think we were about 15 degrees or so in Montana when it started going a bit haywire. Warmer weather, all good.
customer_reviews.author: 72Camaro

customer_reviews.title: Works just great for that annoying neighbor's dog!
customer_reviews.text: Works just great for that annoying neighbor's dog! The dog can't see me so it doesn't know what the different calls are. Using the deer call, the dog runs into its' doggy door! hilarious Now to learn to use it for the purpose intended!
customer_reviews.author: Kzudid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Very helpful app!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This call is easy to use and comes with loads of helpful instructions and tips for the beginner and experience caller through the FREE app provided. I recommend this to all my hunting friends. I cant wait to put my practice with this call to good use this season!
customer_reviews.author: Amzng Cstmr

customer_reviews.title: Locks Up in Cold !
customer_reviews.text: Good concept but mine froze up in low 30’s temps my first two times out. No moisture/rain, just cold. Frustrating when I needed it and it simply would not take air. The sound slider became difficult to use too - like it froze up too. Again, no high moisture - just standard cold. Be advised you may need to keep it warm in your hands muff.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great Call with very realisitc sounds
customer_reviews.text: This call makes great sounds. One thing this call will do, which I have never heard anyone else talk about, is that you can use this call by inhaling..... softer/more subtle grunts. Either way this call makes a very realistic sound. I have not had any trouble with freezing up but I have yet to use it in really cold weather - time will tell. So far I love it and it is so easy to switch between all the deer sounds. Great Product! Five star once I see how it functions in really cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: DaveT

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile game call
customer_reviews.text: WATCH THE VIDEO. It is absolutely critical to WATCH THE VIDEO. Trying to use it without WATCHING the video will be pointless. This game call is literally the second most valued piece of hunting equipment I have besides my bow. Amazing results but again I watched the video and practiced allot.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement over my previous grunt call. Easy to use and sounds amazing. Easy to switch between doe and buck with the slide. Can YouTube instructional videos for this call.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Call Deer they run away
customer_reviews.text: Well to me it sounds good. But when I saw deer I tried it. And they ran away from me! So when I see that why would I try calling to try to make them come in. I would just be clearing my area.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy Product Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very different from the advertised product! No labeling, no directions, no quality control in product assembly.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Originally skeptical as "another deer call". Called in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally skeptical as "another deer call". Called in a doe to get my last deer for the season. Tried others all year prior and convinced would have gone home that day skunked if it wasn't for the deer call. The deer respond to this call! Practice using...It will make the difference when in the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Average grunt tube.
customer_reviews.text: My opinion average sound quality easy to use for different settings. 20 degrees one morning and the inside reed froze and it would not work until I blew some os my warm breath into the reed then it worked again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary V.

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Extinguisher Deer Call. All I can say about this is "IT WORKS". I've called numerous deer with it and they come right to me to investigate. Last year, I heard a buck in the distance during the rut at night, and I had him going nuts because he thought another buck was in the area. He was about 200 yards away stomping and running in bursts toward the area where I was when ever he heard me call. It was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Yeshua's Talmidim

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Husband bought one fire more $$ from Cabellas which only had one sound option and was of lower quality but couldn’t return it. He ordered this one and this is the first year he got a buck. Almost had an 8point too the next day but missed his shot. The area he was hunting did not have many guys going home with deer so I have no doubt this call lured them in. My dad saw and loved it so we ordered him one too!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love to have the different sounds available just by sliding a piece! You can sound like several different deer without looking at the call or getting another call out.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Krukow

customer_reviews.title: Best call out there
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, works great, love the app with all of the videos, great product and a must have, only deer call I use now. No more cans, grunts or flex calls.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best deer call there is that I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy another
customer_reviews.text: Used this a couple times, sounds okay. It froze up one day hunting and broke even though they say if it happens to move the slide and it will free up. It didnt
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Has a good sound but don't waste you money on the camo ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a good sound but don't waste you money on the camo one. Have had the call for one month and taken it to the woods six or seven times and the camo coating is coming off. For the money I would expect it to last longer than that. Over all the sound and convenience of the call is good. I am not abusive to my tools and equipment just so you know. I don't throw stuff around and bang it up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Scared my sister with it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my brother-in-law since he likes to hunt deer. Can't say how well it works for how it is intended, but when he snuck up behind my sister with it and blew it in her ear, she did jump quite a bit. For that I'll give it a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ries

customer_reviews.title: Great call - don't lose the o-ring, but if you do: go to the website and get a replacement cheap!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good game call, but has one massive problem: if you take it apart to clean it or look at it, the o-ring falls out. However, Illusion Game Call Systems provides a new reed and o-ring on their website for free, just $0.99 shipping. I presume they have had a lot of problems with this and came up with this solution, which I think is an excellent one. It's faster to buy O-rings from a store, but usually you have to buy a pack to find the right size and it will cost you more than $0.99.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome call
customer_reviews.text: One of the best grunt calls I’ve ever used. Only had this bad chicken for 2 days an already called in 2 deer. I ordered it a day or 2 before opening day of bow season an I had it for the opening day. Only complaint is it didn’t come with the instruction video it said it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would probably be a great tool in populated areas. I have become disabled and had to cut out a lot of hunting and Land rental
customer_reviews.text: Could't give it a 5 star because it doesn't call any deer right in as advertised. Ma work better in a populated deer area.The video is tought to use but the tips and if are great for hunters to learn when and what call to use!! It just didn't help me any and I know how to call!! Does have a great sound and easy to change tones.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Goodale

customer_reviews.title: Bad Instruction DVD
customer_reviews.text: Deer call works great but the instrution dvd is a dud. I ordered this twice and both dvd’s did not play right. Had to go to youtube to get instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kurr Mudgeon

customer_reviews.title: i bought this for my 13 year old granddaughter who ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my 13 year old granddaughter who loves to hunt deer and she loves it will tell you how it works this season!
customer_reviews.author: Woodz

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I made a buck very mad at me using this call in his territory , I didnt know deer sounded like a blowhorn wheb there angry I scared him off not knowing what the sound was im sure I could of called him in if i knew and continued my only complain is the necktie falls off to easy
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Best for success
customer_reviews.text: No matter if you are just starting at any age or if you are a seasoned veteran hunting whitetail, this call is your best chance to bring that score to you. Came highly recommended from an old school hunter that doesn't believe in technology. I agree an highly recommend. A must have
customer_reviews.author: BIGRO

customer_reviews.title: Its okay.
customer_reviews.text: Just another call in my opinion. To date I've been able to turn around one deer with a contact grunt that I needed a closer look at.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Judy

customer_reviews.title: Slide broke
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Easy adjustment. Slide mechanism broke inside after only a few uses. Out of the 30 day window, so no returns.
customer_reviews.author: Almost F.

customer_reviews.title: 5 doe and my freezer needs fill'n so it's going to get a real good field test
customer_reviews.text: The Illusion Extinguisher Deer Call is quite simply a work of art and a quality product all around, straight out of the package. Oklahoma's archery season runs from Oct. 1 to Jan. 15. We can take 2 bucks, 5 doe and my freezer needs fill'n so it's going to get a real good field test. I will post an update (or two) to this review during and after the 2017-18 season.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Andrews

customer_reviews.title: this thing is amazing. Watch the video and it'll work like a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this call for a week maybe two. I have used it 3 times. Every time I've used it within 30 minutes there is been a buck at my stand or blind. I actually called a four point buck back to my blind 3 times in 2 hours. I just shot a nine pointer today. I got in my stand at 3:30 p.m. and shot him at 4 p.m. this thing is amazing. Watch the video and it'll work like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Use this to turn a nice Doe around and calmed her down. That Doe is now in my freezer. Also had a small buck take off at a doe bleat, so mixed results.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Call
customer_reviews.text: Very good call. It is extremely versatile and easy to use. I was able to call in a number of younger bucks very quickly this season. The slide mechanism changes the tone well allowing a hunter to have options. I would suggest watching all of the videos on how to use.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Try it and you'll be happy
customer_reviews.text: I had no experience yet with a deer... But I can tell you one thing sounds so realistic and very very easy to use!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosario G.

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, easy to use , doesn't sound much different than my ez grunter. haven't had much opportunity to use it much.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Coburn

product_meta.title: Illusion Systems Extinguisher Deer Call - All-in-one Deer Calling System
feature_bullets: PATENTED MODISLIDE - Freeze-free design adjusts to sound like a Buck, a Doe or a Fawn in an instant.
99.6% APPROVAL RATING - Highest rated deer call in NAHC Field Test. A must for the serious hunter!
THROAT-TUBE - Dual-layered technology produces realistic sounds and allows for directional calling.

#1 RATED - Extinguisher is the best selling deer call on the market! The Extinguisher is proudly designed, molded and assembled right here in the USA. Every call is hand tuned and tested before we ship it to you and has a satisfaction guarantee!

Free Instructional Videos - Watch our detailed instructional series and learn how to effectively communicate with deer. Simply download the FREE 'Deer Society' mobile app for access to hours of educational video content!
